Texts.Chs: ^green;离心机^reset;可以从材料中分离液体等其他物质。离心机有多个种类，但我们从最简单的开始：先试着建造一台^orange;木制离心机^reset;。
Texts.Eng: A ^green;centrifuge^reset; allows you to separate liquid from material, and more. There are several types of these devices, but we'll start simple: build a ^orange;Wooden Centrifuge^reset; to get started.

Texts.Chs: 虽然效果有些差强人意，但^orange;木制离心机^reset;仍然能够处理一些基本的液体，研磨蜂窝来得到里面的好东西。如果要提高实用性，你应该尽快升级到an^orange;铁制离心机^reset;。
Texts.Eng: While not incredibly effective, a ^orange;Wooden Centrifuge^reset; is able to process basic liquids and grind up honeycombs to get at the goodies inside. As soon as possible, upgrade to an ^orange;Iron Centrifuge^reset; for far more utility.
